caption.p:
Intradimer and interdimer couplings in Ba 2CuSi 2O 6Cl 2. a Possible interactions between Cu atoms. Shaded and open circles indicate two symmetrically different Cu atoms. The intradimer coupling formed by the two Cu atoms are represented by thick black lines, and the interdimer couplings are represented by dashed red, dotted yellow, and thin blue lines. b Effective couplings between dimers expected from the crystal symmetry Cmc2 1. Dashed, dotted, and solid lines represent hopping amplitudes denoted by J A,
